CustomField.description: Calculate the next birthday anniversary. 29 February is always replaced by 28. This field is referenced in TECH_UpcomingAnniversaryDate__c (used in the ios app to get birthday clients)
CustomField.formula: DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) + IF( OR( MONTH(Birthdate) < MONTH (TODAY() ) , AND( MONTH(Birthdate) = MONTH (TODAY() ) , DAY(Birthdate) < DAY (TODAY() ) ) ) , 1 , 0 )) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Birthdate) ) & "-" & TEXT( IF( MONTH( Birthdate) = 2 && DAY( Birthdate) = 29 ,28, DAY( Birthdate)) ) )
CustomField.label: TECH Upcoming Birthday Date
